languages.text: "Беда, уважаем{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа}! Даже не знаю, как описать-то. Уже как... сколько ж прошло... да несколько месяцев, наверное... уже несколько месяцев изводят нас твари колдовские! Здесь как началась ночь, так они и полезли — прямо из теней, черные как сажа, удержу не знают! Только тем и спасаемся, что жжем огни да в охранении стоим — и все равно, гады, таскают нас по одному, по двое, когда кто-то зазевается".

traits.locale_text: "Беда, уважаем{mf|ый|ая}! Даже не знаю, как описать-то. Уже как... сколько ж прошло... да несколько месяцев, наверное... уже несколько месяцев изводят нас твари колдовские! Здесь как началась ночь, так они и полезли — прямо из теней, черные как сажа, удержу не знают! Только тем и спасаемся, что жжем огни да в охранении стоим — и все равно, гады, таскают нас по одному, по двое, когда кто-то зазевается."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

languages.text: "It's terrible, my {mf|lord|lady}! I don't even know how to describe it. It's been, what... how long has it been... a few months, probably... a few months of being plagued by these sorcerous beasts! As soon as night fell, they came — creeping right out of the shadows, black as soot, there's no stopping them! The only thing that's worked so far is keeping the fires burning and maintaining a constant watch — and even with that, the creatures drag us off in ones and twos the second we drop our guard."
languages.original_text: "Беда, уважаем{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа}! Даже не знаю, как описать-то. Уже как... сколько ж прошло... да несколько месяцев, наверное... уже несколько месяцев изводят нас твари колдовские! Здесь как началась ночь, так они и полезли — прямо из теней, черные как сажа, удержу не знают! Только тем и спасаемся, что жжем огни да в охранении стоим — и все равно, гады, таскают нас по одному, по двое, когда кто-то зазевается".

The only thing that's worked so far is keeping the fires burning and maintaining a constant watch — and even with that, the creatures drag us off in ones and twos the second we drop our guard."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

languages.text: “简直是太可怕了，大人！我都不知道该怎么形容！那已经多久了……大概有好几个月了吧……那些巫术召唤来的怪物，整整肆虐了好几个月！每当夜幕降临，他们就会从阴影里爬出来。他们黑得像煤灰一样，根本没办法阻止他们！到目前为止，唯一有效的方法就是生着营火，始终保持警惕。但即便是这样，只要我们一放松警惕，他们还是会把我们三三两两地拖走。”
languages.original_text: "It's terrible, my {mf|lord|lady}! I don't even know how to describe it. It's been, what... how long has it been... a few months, probably... a few months of being plagued by these sorcerous beasts! As soon as night fell, they came — creeping right out of the shadows, black as soot, there's no stopping them! The only thing that's worked so far is keeping the fires burning and maintaining a constant watch — and even with that, the creatures drag us off in ones and twos the second we drop our guard."

traits.locale_text: “简直是太可怕了，大人！我都不知道该怎么形容！那已经多久了……大概有好几个月了吧……那些巫术召唤来的怪物，整整肆虐了好几个月！每当夜幕降临，他们就会从阴影里爬出来。他们黑得像煤灰一样，根本没办法阻止他们！到目前为止，唯一有效的方法就是生着营火，始终保持警惕。但即便是这样，只要我们一放松警惕，他们还是会把我们三三两两地拖走。”
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

languages.text: «¡Es horrible, mi{mf|lord|lady}! No sé ni cómo describirlo. Ha pasado... ¿cuánto?... Unos meses, creo... ¡Unos meses asolados por esas bestias hechiceras! En cuanto cayó la noche, aparecieron arrastrándose desde las sombras, negros como el hollín, ¡y no hay forma de detenerlos! Lo único que ha funcionado hasta ahora es mantener las hogueras encendidas y una guardia constante... e, incluso así, las criaturas nos atrapan en cuanto se reducen nuestros números y bajamos la guardia».
languages.original_text: "It's terrible, my {mf|lord|lady}! I don't even know how to describe it. It's been, what... how long has it been... a few months, probably... a few months of being plagued by these sorcerous beasts! As soon as night fell, they came — creeping right out of the shadows, black as soot, there's no stopping them! The only thing that's worked so far is keeping the fires burning and maintaining a constant watch — and even with that, the creatures drag us off in ones and twos the second we drop our guard."

traits.locale_text: «¡Es horrible, mi{mf|lord|lady}! No sé ni cómo describirlo. Ha pasado... ¿cuánto?... Unos meses, creo... ¡Unos meses asolados por esas bestias hechiceras! En cuanto cayó la noche, aparecieron arrastrándose desde las sombras, negros como el hollín, ¡y no hay forma de detenerlos! Lo único que ha funcionado hasta ahora es mantener las hogueras encendidas y una guardia constante... e, incluso así, las criaturas nos atrapan en cuanto se reducen nuestros números y bajamos la guardia».
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

languages.text: 「ひどいものですよ、陛下！それをどう説明したらいいのかさえわかりません。もう、何…どれくらい経ったのでしょう…数か月、おそらく…数か月この魔獣に悩まされている。夜になるとすぐに、彼らは影から忍び寄ってきて、煤のように真っ黒で、止めることはできません！これまでのところうまくいっているのは、火を燃やし続け、常に見張っていることだけです — それでも、私たちが油断した瞬間に、クリーチャーは私たちを一気に引きずり込んでしまう」
languages.original_text: "It's terrible, my {mf|lord|lady}! I don't even know how to describe it. It's been, what... how long has it been... a few months, probably... a few months of being plagued by these sorcerous beasts! As soon as night fell, they came — creeping right out of the shadows, black as soot, there's no stopping them! The only thing that's worked so far is keeping the fires burning and maintaining a constant watch — and even with that, the creatures drag us off in ones and twos the second we drop our guard."

traits.locale_text: 「ひどいものですよ、陛下！それをどう説明したらいいのかさえわかりません。もう、何…どれくらい経ったのでしょう…数か月、おそらく…数か月この魔獣に悩まされている。夜になるとすぐに、彼らは影から忍び寄ってきて、煤のように真っ黒で、止めることはできません！これまでのところうまくいっているのは、火を燃やし続け、常に見張っていることだけです — それでも、私たちが油断した瞬間に、クリーチャーは私たちを一気に引きずり込んでしまう」
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

languages.text: « C'est terrible, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame} ! Je ne sais même pas comment le décrire. Ça fait... Oh, je ne sais même plus. Plusieurs mois ? Oui, ça fait plusieurs mois que nous sommes assaillis par ces abominables créatures ! Dès que la nuit tombe, elles sortent des ombres, noires comme la suie... et rien ne semble pouvoir les arrêter ! Nous n'avons trouvé qu'une seule manière de nous protéger : en laissant des feux allumés et en montant la garde en permanence. Malgré tout, ces bêtes nous attrapent un par un, parfois deux d'un coup, au moindre relâchement. »
languages.original_text: "It's terrible, my {mf|lord|lady}! I don't even know how to describe it. It's been, what... how long has it been... a few months, probably... a few months of being plagued by these sorcerous beasts! As soon as night fell, they came — creeping right out of the shadows, black as soot, there's no stopping them! The only thing that's worked so far is keeping the fires burning and maintaining a constant watch — and even with that, the creatures drag us off in ones and twos the second we drop our guard."

traits.locale_text: « C'est terrible, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame} ! Je ne sais même pas comment le décrire. Ça fait... Oh, je ne sais même plus. Plusieurs mois ? Oui, ça fait plusieurs mois que nous sommes assaillis par ces abominables créatures ! Dès que la nuit tombe, elles sortent des ombres, noires comme la suie... et rien ne semble pouvoir les arrêter ! Nous n'avons trouvé qu'une seule manière de nous protéger : en laissant des feux allumés et en montant la garde en permanence. Malgré tout, ces bêtes nous attrapent un par un, parfois deux d'un coup, au moindre relâchement. »
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

languages.text: "Es ist ganz furchtbar, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ich weiß gar nicht, wie ich es beschreiben soll. Es war vor ... wie lange ist das jetzt her? ... vor ein paar Monaten vielleicht ... schon seit Monaten suchen uns diese Hexerbestien heim! Sobald es Nacht war, kamen sie – direkt aus den Schatten, schwarz wie Ruß, und nichts konnte sie aufhalten! Das Einzige, was bislang funktioniert hat, waren ständig brennende Feuer und Wachen rund um die Uhr – und selbst dann haben die Kreaturen jede Sekunde der Unachtsamkeit genutzt und einen oder zwei von uns verschleppt."
languages.original_text: "It's terrible, my {mf|lord|lady}! I don't even know how to describe it. It's been, what... how long has it been... a few months, probably... a few months of being plagued by these sorcerous beasts! As soon as night fell, they came — creeping right out of the shadows, black as soot, there's no stopping them! The only thing that's worked so far is keeping the fires burning and maintaining a constant watch — and even with that, the creatures drag us off in ones and twos the second we drop our guard."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist ganz furchtbar, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ich weiß gar nicht, wie ich es beschreiben soll. Es war vor ... wie lange ist das jetzt her? ... vor ein paar Monaten vielleicht ... schon seit Monaten suchen uns diese Hexerbestien heim! Sobald es Nacht war, kamen sie – direkt aus den Schatten, schwarz wie Ruß, und nichts konnte sie aufhalten! Das Einzige, was bislang funktioniert hat, waren ständig brennende Feuer und Wachen rund um die Uhr – und selbst dann haben die Kreaturen jede Sekunde der Unachtsamkeit genutzt und einen oder zwei von uns verschleppt."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

languages.text: "Durum çok kötü {mf|lordum|leydim}! Nasıl tanımlayacağımı bile bilemiyorum. Ne kadar oldu? Birkaç ay muhtemelen. O büyülü yaratıklar bize musallat olalı birkaç ay oldu! Akşam olur olmaz gelmeye başladılar. Direkt gölgelerden çıkıyorlar, kurum gibi siyah ve durdurulamazlar! Şu ana kadar fayda sağlayan tek şey, ateşlerin sürekli yanmasını sağlamak ve nöbet tutmak. O durumda bile yaratıklar, gardımızı düşürdüğümüz an bizi birer ikişer kapıp götürüyor."
languages.original_text: "It's terrible, my {mf|lord|lady}! I don't even know how to describe it. It's been, what... how long has it been... a few months, probably... a few months of being plagued by these sorcerous beasts! As soon as night fell, they came — creeping right out of the shadows, black as soot, there's no stopping them! The only thing that's worked so far is keeping the fires burning and maintaining a constant watch — and even with that, the creatures drag us off in ones and twos the second we drop our guard."

traits.locale_text: "Durum çok kötü {mf|lordum|leydim}! Nasıl tanımlayacağımı bile bilemiyorum. Ne kadar oldu? Ne kadar... Birkaç ay oldu muhtemelen. O büyülü yaratıklar bize musallat olalı birkaç ay oldu! Gece olur olmaz gelmeye başladılar. Direkt gölgelerden çıkıyorlar, kurum gibi siyahlar ve durdurulmaları imkânsız! Şu ana kadar fayda sağlayan tek şey ateşlerin sürekli yanmasını sağlamak ve sürekli nöbet tutmak. O durumda bile yaratıklar gardımızı düşürdüğümüz an bizi birer ikişer kapıp götürüyorlar."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF
